TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MountRemovedHandler(object o, MountRemovedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MountRemovedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MountRemovedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MountRemovedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MountRemovedHandler is removed from the event.
